mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.sys_org_code AS "sysOrgCode", a.tenant_id AS "tenantId", a.software_id AS "softwareId", a.price_plan_id AS "pricePlanId", a.effective_on AS "effectiveOn", a.expire_on AS "expireOn", a.code AS "code", a.sale_package_id AS "salePackageId", a.ext_form AS "extForm", a.ext_info AS "extInfo"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO int_tenant_software( id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, sys_org_code, tenant_id, software_id, price_plan_id, effective_on, expire_on, code, sale_package_id, extForm, extInfo ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateTime}, #{sysOrgCode}, #{tenantId}, #{softwareId}, #{pricePlanId}, #{effectiveOn}, #{expireOn}, #{code}, #{salePackageId}, #{extForm}, #{extInfo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE int_tenant_software SET create_time = #{createTime}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateTime}, sys_org_code = #{sysOrgCode}, tenant_id = #{tenantId}, software_id = #{softwareId}, price_plan_id = #{pricePlanId}, effective_on = #{effectiveOn}, expire_on = #{expireOn}, code = #{code}, sale_package_id = #{salePackageId}, extForm = #{extForm}, extInfo = #{extInfo} WHERE id = #{id}
